department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has published a procurement solicitation for the purchase of an Aluminum Jet Boat with trailer. This boat will be used by the and Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for its operational needs.
full_summary:
================

### Request for Proposal: F1688-240005

**Tender Title:** F1688-240005 - 4.8-5.5m Aluminum Jet Boat with Trailer

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End-User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal - Demande de propositions

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

**Contract Contact Information:**

* Jason Smith (SPAC/PSPC) - jasoon.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Proposal Submission Deadline:** 2024-01-11, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Contract Details:**

*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-11
*   Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-19
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2025-06-06
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   UNSPSC: Commercial Marine Craft

**Proposal Content:**

Please submit a proposal that includes:

*   Technical specifications for the 4.8-5.5m Aluminum Jet Boat with trailer
*   Proof of Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) compliance
*   Bidder's qualification and experience

**Eligible Submissions:**

Submissions must be made through the online portal. The contact person, Jason Smith, can be reached for any questions or clarifications.

**Bidding Requirements:**

The contract will be awarded based on the "Lowest Price" selection criteria.

### Authorized Purchaser: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Attention Contractors:**

This information is provided as a courtesy. The original document has been condensed for easier reading. Please consult the full document for any required information not detailed above. 

Spoiler alert: it took me about 200 words to write 60% of this text.
This is because I ignore lots of fields which contained repetitive information. Here are the excluded fields:

* fields that contained "None" or some kind of links (especially the discovery.ariba.com stuff), 
* fields related to trade agreements, risk management, authority level, pickup sites, tender end status and results among others.
* Address lines and other such details.

Let me know if you need me to
